title: Clickbait: A Netflix Original Hit or Miss?
itunes:title: Clickbait: A Netflix Original Hit or Miss?
itunes:subtitle: Is it us or is Adrian Grenier aging like a fine wine?
description:
Join us as we walk you through our most recent Netflix original obsession. We debate its realism, the bystander effect, the psychology of clickbait and ethical journalism. But most importantly, when are we getting an Entourage reboot?


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
